Question 9
Human have the ability to construct worlds entirely in their minds, which don’t exist in the physical world. 
So far as we known, no other species possess this ability. This skill is so important that we have different 
words to refer to its different flavors, such as imagination, invention and innovation.
Based on above passage, which one of the following is TRUE?
(A) The terms imagination, invention and innovation refer to unrelated skills.
(B) No species possess the ability to construct worlds in their mind.
(C) Imagination, invention and innovation are unrelated to the ability to construct metal worlds.
(D) We do not know of any species other than humans. who posses the ability to construct mental worlds.
explanation_text:
Sol. 
As given in the above passage “so far as we know, no other species posses this ability”. By this we can 
conclude option D is correct.
Hence, the correct option is (D).
